name: 魔淫の宴
summary: Main hero is jealous of his colleague who managed to get a promotion and also married their common acquaintance. Hero kidnaps that wife's younger sister and blackmails them into intimate relations.
info:
• 中文名: 魔淫之宴
  • 开发: BLACK PACKAGE TRY
  • 原画: 藤原秋久
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 1998/10/23
  • 官方网站: https://web.archive.org/web/20010124124700/http://www.blackpackage.co.jp/products/ma/index.html
  • 剧本: 三波雄

relations.title: 憂淫の虜～魔淫の宴より～
